
Controlled Contentious and Malicious(COCOMA) framework - 1.0
************************************************************

COCOMA framework was designed by SAP as part of EU funded BonFIRE
project. Task of COCOMA framework is to create, monitor and control
contentious and malicious system workload. By using this framework
experimenters are able to make testing process more accurate and
anticipate various scenarios of cloud infrastructure behaviour,
collect and correlate metrics of the emulated environment with the
test results.
